about.title: ABOUT COACH DEVESA
about.p1: Federico Devesa is a former professional boxer and certified coach by the Argentine Boxing Federation. His competitive career spans multiple combat disciplines, allowing him to teach a complete and applicable system: real technique, defense, footwork, timing, and fighting mindset.
about.p2: Additionally, Federico achieved championships in full contact kickboxing and Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, establishing himself as a national reference for his versatility and experience. In Europe, Federico presents intensive masterclasses for all levels: simple progressions, fine corrections, and a method that gives you concrete tools to improve from day one.
about.p3: Federico's approach combines technical precision with practical application. His seminars focus on fundamentals that translate directly to competition and self-defense. With experience in multiple disciplines, he brings a unique perspective that enriches traditional boxing methodology with learnings from striking and grappling.

group.title: Group Seminars (1-2 Hours)
group.description: Intensive technical sessions designed for boxing academies and clubs. Ideal for mixed-level groups looking to improve fundamentals, add new tools, and take away an applicable method from day one.
topics: Boxing fundamentals: stance, footwork, balance and stability
Pad work for coaches: technique, corrections, round structure
Motivational talk: weigh-ins, fights, amateur boxers, etc.

private.title: Private Training
private.description: 1-on-1 or small group sessions (1-8 people) for boxers seeking personalized attention under Federico Devesa's guidance. Ideal for competitive preparation, technical refinement, and intensive skill development.
private.focus: Step-by-step technical correction, reviewing and adjusting all key boxing concepts: stance and guard, footwork, distance management, blocks and parries, slips and head movement, leg work, coordination and timing.

booking.title: Booking Information
booking.description: Federico will be available in Europe from late May to mid-June 2026. The first stage of the tour focuses primarily on Spain, with the possibility of adding additional dates and extending the tour based on confirmed bookings. Early booking recommended to secure preferred dates.
